creditline: Gift of Paul Maurer and Scott West
description: pink, tan, brown, red, and white; etching-style idealized portraits of three toddlers--one child reclining and looking up, child at left pointing down at medallion held by reclining child, child at right standing with PL arm upraised, looking down at reclining child; round and heart-shaped elements with text behind children; red typewritten text at bottom
image_copyright: © Chet Helms DBA Family Dog Productions. All Rights Reserved
provenance: Paul Maurer, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2019.
title: Jerry Steig and the Satyrs, Sons of Champlin, The 4th Way, Avalon Ballroom, March 29-31, 1968
